fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.env

Interface PropertiesBuilder<P>

  • Type Parameters:
    P - the type of the parent builder (when calling Parent.and() method)
    All Superinterfaces:
    Builder<Properties>, Parent<P>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PropertiesBuilderDelegate, SimplePropertiesBuilder

    public interface PropertiesBuilder<P>
extends Parent<P>, Builder<Properties>
    Registers custom properties (see Properties).

      • set

        PropertiesBuilder<P> set(String key,
                         String value)
        Sets a property (key/value pair). Calling several times this method with the same key overrides any previously defined value.
        Parameters:
        key - the property key
        value - the property value
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent chaining

      • set

        PropertiesBuilder<P> set(String key,
                         Object value)
        Sets a property (key/value pair). Calling several times this method with the same key overrides any previously defined value.

        This is a convenience method, value is converted to string and is the same as converting it manually.

        Parameters:
        key - the property key
        value - the property value
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent chaining
